fr.upmc.autonomicController.connectors

Class AutonomicControllerManagementConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
      • fr.upmc.autonomicController.connectors.AutonomicControllerManagementConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutonomicControllerManagementI, fr.upmc.components.connectors.ConnectorI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.ComponentImplementedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.RequiredI, java.rmi.Remote

    public class AutonomicControllerManagementConnector
extends fr.upmc.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
implements AutonomicControllerManagementI
    The class AutonomicControllerManagementConnector implements a standard client/server connector for the management autonomic controller management interface.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant      true
